document.full_text: - europe should consider strengthening central control of economic policy if efforts to deal with its debt crisis do not deliver results, european central bank president jean-claude trichet said on thursday.
document.title: ecb's trichet: more eu economic powers next step in crisis
lines_and_colors: - europe should consider strengthening central control of economic policy if efforts to deal with its debt crisis do not deliver results, european central bank president jean-claude trichet said on thursday.
